title: False alarm...
content:
Just noticed that the entry has its classification code as VG - meaning that it's a video game. The entry bp linked to is referring to the Gameboy game. If you look at the [url=http://www.imdb.com/find?q=commander+keen]search results[/url], you'll see that all the other games are there (with the same VG suffix).
My [url=http://kevan.org/brain.cgi?grafix5000]MindBending Power[/url] is 5.43 points.
Possibly the [url=http://legion.gibbering.net/misterx/troutwar.php?s=grafix5000]funniest thing[/url] on the interweb.
Go to [url=http://www.toxicsheep.com]www.toxicsheep.com[/url] to see my site!

[img]http://www.toxicsheep.com/sigs/scrobblersig.php[/img]
